mapper.insert: insert into mybookmark (bookmark_num, board_num, board_title, id, nickname) values(bookmarkseq.nextval, #{board_num}, #{board_title}, #{id}, #{nickname})
mapper.delete: delete from mybookmark where board_num=#{board_num} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from mybookmark where board_num=#{board_num}
